faqs.question: How can I get back to survival server's lobby?

answer.text: There is no way to get back to survival server's lobby area. Unless you die without resetting respawn position (Sleep in a bed) or your bed is detroyed or the surroundings of your bed is not suitable for respawn (Blocked by blocks or stabs)

faqs.question: I slept in a bed but my respawn point is not reset!

answer.text: The surroundings of your bed must be suitable for respawn. Blocks and slabs will cause the bed unable to respawn player. Thus, remember to have some space around your bed to avoid this from happening.

faqs.question: Other players seems like ignoring my chat.

to learn how to send a message globally.
